reviewText: This is French silent black and white film. Where there are French words on cards, there is no English subtitles. The restoration is fairly decent on most of the films. This is adult material with FF nudity and explicit depiction of sex: voyeur, upskirt, FF, MM, MMF, MFF.
More erotic cinema of the past. It shows a real variety and is fun to watch. There are a lot of good scenes.
